all.description: Displays the contents of a comment.

all.name: core/comment-date
all.title: Comment Date
all.description: Displays the date on which the comment was posted.

all.name: core/comment-edit-link
all.title: Comment Edit Link
all.description: Displays a link to edit the comment in the WordPress Dashboard. This link is only visible to users with the edit comment capability.

all.name: core/comment-reply-link
all.title: Comment Reply Link
all.description: Displays a link to reply to a comment.

all.name: core/comment-template
all.title: Comment Template
all.description: Contains the block elements used to display a comment, like the title, date, author, avatar and more.

all.name: core/comments
all.title: Comments
all.description: An advanced block that allows displaying post comments using different visual configurations.

all.name: core/comments-pagination

all.description: Displays a paginated navigation to next/previous set of comments, when applicable.

all.name: core/comments-pagination-next
all.title: Comments Next Page
all.description: Displays the next comment's page link.

all.name: core/comments-pagination-numbers
all.title: Comments Page Numbers
all.description: Displays a list of page numbers for comments pagination.

all.name: core/comments-pagination-previous
all.title: Comments Previous Page
all.description: Displays the previous comment's page link.

all.name: core/comments-title

all.description: Displays a title with the number of comments.

all.description: Display footnotes added to the page.

all.title: Gallery
all.description: Display multiple images in a rich gallery.

all.name: core/heading

all.description: Create a link that always points to the homepage of the site. Usually not necessary if there is already a site title link present in the header.

all.title: Title

all.title: Query Loop
all.description: An advanced block that allows displaying post types based on different query parameters and visual configurations.

all.name: core/query-no-results
all.title: No Results
all.description: Contains the block elements used to render content when no query results are found.

all.name: core/query-pagination
all.title: Pagination
all.description: Displays a paginated navigation to next/previous set of posts, when applicable.

all.name: core/query-pagination-next
all.title: Next Page
all.description: Displays the next posts page link.

all.name: core/query-pagination-numbers
all.title: Page Numbers
all.description: Displays a list of page numbers for pagination.

all.name: core/query-pagination-previous
all.title: Previous Page
all.description: Displays the previous posts page link.

all.name: core/query-title
all.title: Query Title
all.description: Display the query title.

all.name: core/query-total
all.title: Query Total
all.description: Display the total number of results in a query.

all.name: core/read-more
all.title: Read More
all.description: Displays the link of a post, page, or any other content-type.

all.name: core/rss
all.title: RSS
all.description: Display entries from any RSS or Atom feed.

all.name: core/search
all.title: Search
all.description: Help visitors find your content.

all.name: core/shortcode
all.title: Shortcode
all.description: Insert additional custom elements with a WordPress shortcode.

all.name: core/site-logo
all.title: Site Logo
all.description: Display an image to represent this site. Update this block and the changes apply everywhere.

all.name: core/site-tagline
all.title: Site Tagline
all.description: Describe in a few words what the site is about. The tagline can be used in search results or when sharing on social networks even if it’s not displayed in the theme design.

all.name: core/site-title
all.title: Site Title
all.description: Displays the name of this site. Update the block, and the changes apply everywhere it’s used. This will also appear in the browser title bar and in search results.

all.name: core/social-link
all.title: Social Icon
all.description: Display an icon linking to a social profile or site.

all.name: core/tag-cloud
all.title: Tag Cloud
all.description: A cloud of popular keywords, each sized by how often it appears.

all.name: core/template-part
all.title: Template Part
all.description: Edit the different global regions of your site, like the header, footer, sidebar, or create your own.

variations.name: area_header
variations.title: Header
variations.description: The Header template defines a page area that typically contains a title, logo, and main navigation.

variations.name: area_footer
variations.title: Footer
variations.description: The Footer template defines a page area that typically contains site credits, social links, or any other combination of blocks.

all.name: core/term-description
all.title: Term Description
all.description: Display the description of categories, tags and custom taxonomies when viewing an archive.

all.name: core/audio
all.title: Audio
all.description: Embed a simple audio player.

all.name: core/buttons
all.title: Buttons
all.description: Prompt visitors to take action with a group of button-style links.

all.name: core/code
all.title: Code
all.description: Display code snippets that respect your spacing and tabs.

all.name: core/column
all.title: Column
all.description: A single column within a columns block.

all.name: core/columns
all.title: Columns
all.description: Display content in multiple columns, with blocks added to each column.

all.name: core/details
all.title: Details
all.description: Hide and show additional content.

all.name: core/embed
all.title: Embed
all.description: Add a block that displays content pulled from other sites, like Twitter or YouTube.

all.name: core/freeform
all.title: Classic
all.description: Use the classic WordPress editor.

all.name: core/group
all.title: Group
all.description: Gather blocks in a layout container.

all.name: core/html
all.title: Custom HTML
all.description: Add custom HTML code and preview it as you edit.

all.name: core/list-item
all.title: List Item
all.description: An individual item within a list.

all.name: core/missing
all.title: Unsupported
all.description: Your site doesn’t include support for this block.

all.name: core/more
all.title: More
all.description: Content before this block will be shown in the excerpt on your archives page.

all.name: core/nextpage
all.title: Page Break
all.description: Separate your content into a multi-page experience.

all.name: core/paragraph
all.title: Paragraph
all.description: Start with the basic building block of all narrative.

all.name: core/preformatted
all.title: Preformatted
all.description: Add text that respects your spacing and tabs, and also allows styling.

all.name: core/pullquote
all.title: Pullquote
all.description: Give special visual emphasis to a quote from your text.

all.name: core/quote
all.title: Quote
all.description: Give quoted text visual emphasis. "In quoting others, we cite ourselves." — Julio Cortázar

all.name: core/separator
all.title: Separator
all.description: Create a break between ideas or sections with a horizontal separator.

all.name: core/social-links
all.title: Social Icons
all.description: Display icons linking to your social profiles or sites.

all.name: core/spacer

all.name: core/table

all.description: This block is deprecated. Please use the Columns block instead.

all.name: core/verse
all.title: Verse
all.description: Insert poetry. Use special spacing formats. Or quote song lyrics.

all.name: core/video
all.title: Video
all.description: Embed a video from your media library or upload a new one.

patterns.title: Three columns with offset images
patterns.description: Three columns with offset images.

patterns.name: core/three-columns-with-images-and-text
patterns.title: Three columns with images and text
patterns.content:
ECOSYSTEM

Positive growth.

Nature, in the common sense, refers to essences unchanged by man; space, the air, the river, the leaf. Art is applied to the mixture of his will with the same things, as in a house, a canal, a statue, a picture.

But his operations taken together are so insignificant, a little chipping, baking, patching, and washing, that in an impression so grand as that of the world on the human mind, they do not vary the result.

Undoubtedly we have no questions to ask which are unanswerable. We must trust the perfection of the creation so far, as to believe that whatever curiosity the order of things has awakened in our minds, the order of things can satisfy. Every man's condition is a solution in hieroglyphic to those inquiries he would put.
patterns.description: Three columns with images and text, with vertical spacing for an offset look.

patterns.name: core/two-columns-of-text-with-offset-heading
patterns.title: Two columns of text with offset heading
patterns.content:
Oceanic Inspiration

Winding veils round their heads, the women walked on deck. They were now moving steadily down the river, passing the dark shapes of ships at anchor, and London was a swarm of lights with a pale yellow canopy drooping above it. There were the lights of the great theatres, the lights of the long streets, lights that indicated huge squares of domestic comfort, lights that hung high in air.

No darkness would ever settle upon those lamps, as no darkness had settled upon them for hundreds of years. It seemed dreadful that the town should blaze for ever in the same spot; dreadful at least to people going away to adventure upon the sea, and beholding it as a circumscribed mound, eternally burnt, eternally scarred. From the deck of the ship the great city appeared a crouched and cowardly figure, a sedentary miser.
patterns.description: Two columns of text with an offset heading.

patterns.name: core/media-and-text-in-a-full-height-container
patterns.title: Media and text in a full height container
patterns.content:
What's the problem?

Trees are more important today than ever before. More than 10,000 products are reportedly made from trees. Through chemistry, the humble woodpile is yielding chemicals, plastics and fabrics that were beyond comprehension when an axe first felled a Texas tree.

Learn more
patterns.description: Media and text block with image to the left and text and button to the right.

patterns.content:
Shore with Blue Sea

Eleanor Harris (American, 1901-1942)

patterns.content:
Overseas:
1500 — 1960

An exhibition about the different representations of the ocean throughout time, between the sixteenth and the twentieth century. Taking place in our Open Room in Floor 2.

Visit
patterns.description: Large header with background image and text and button on top.

patterns.name: core/large-header-with-left-aligned-text
patterns.title: Large header with left-aligned text
patterns.content:
Forest.

Even a child knows how valuable the forest is. The fresh, breathtaking smell of trees. Echoing birds flying above that dense magnitude. A stable climate, a sustainable diverse life and a source of culture. Yet, forests and other ecosystems hang in the balance, threatened to become croplands, pasture, and plantations.
patterns.description: Cover image with quote on top

patterns.name: core/heading
patterns.title: Heading
patterns.content: We're a studio in Berlin with an international practice in architecture, urban planning and interior design. We believe in sharing knowledge and promoting dialogue to increase the creative potential of collaboration.
patterns.description: Heading text

patterns.name: core/two-columns-of-text-and-title
patterns.title: Two columns of text and title
patterns.content:
The voyage had begun, and had begun happily with a soft blue sky, and a calm sea.

They followed her on to the deck. All the smoke and the houses had disappeared, and the ship was out in a wide space of sea very fresh and clear though pale in the early light. They had left London sitting on its mud. A very thin line of shadow tapered on the horizon, scarcely thick enough to stand the burden of Paris, which nevertheless rested upon it. They were free of roads, free of mankind, and the same exhilaration at their freedom ran through them all.

The ship was making her way steadily through small waves which slapped her and then fizzled like effervescing water, leaving a little border of bubbles and foam on either side. The colourless October sky above was thinly clouded as if by the trail of wood-fire smoke, and the air was wonderfully salt and brisk. Indeed it was too cold to stand still. Mrs. Ambrose drew her arm within her husband's, and as they moved off it could be seen from the way in which her sloping cheek turned up to his that she had something private to communicate.
patterns.description: Two columns of text preceded by a long heading.

Single

Enrich our growing community.

  • General admission and member discounts for one adult
  • One free ticket per special exhibition
  • Two single-use guest passes per year
$110 / year

Family

Support special exhibitions.

  • General admission and member discounts for two adults
  • Four free tickets per special exhibition
  • Four single-use guest passes per year
$200 / year

Patron

Take support to the next level.

  • General admission and member discounts for two adults
  • Five free tickets per special exhibition
  • Six single-use guest passes per year
$400 / year

patterns.content:
Airplane

Copper wire, wood base. I created this piece in late 2008. For this work, I aimed to convey both the industrial heaviness of an airplane, but also the cloudlike floating quality you feel when you’re in one.
